nodes.text: Drazkel was the homeworld of Lady Xev Xrexus, leader of the Xrexus Cartel, a collection of semi-legitimate droid manufacturing firms from the Mid Rim. It shared its name with the moon of Drazkel and the Drazkel system.
Drazkel was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
